Reviews.Title: “Good hotel with great staff”
Reviews.Author: JMacL0nd0n
Reviews.Content: stopped hotel 2 nights feb 2005 found clean comfortable excellent location booked via hotels website double room cost us night much cheaper lot looking hotels looked mini bar tea coffee making facilities room bonus staff pleasant helpful 5 minute walk station added bonus saved us taxi fares getting lost maze streets make amsterdam would definately recommend hotel stopping

Reviews.AuthorLocation: Peak District National Park, United Kingdom
Reviews.Title: “Everything was just as expected!”
Reviews.Author: deeredriverone
Reviews.Content: lovely time amsterdam lovely stay made even better fact picked really nice hotel location hotel ideal rooms clean staff pleasant breakfast euros per person per night breakfast good buffet offering cereal cold meats croissants natural yogurt traditional english fare love breakfasts big go breakfast option however prefer light start morning much better paying breakfast going else subject food make sure spend one evening restaurant next door humphreys 19 euros delicious 3 course meal restaurant excellent value would definitely go back

Reviews.Title: “Pluses and Minuses”
Reviews.Author: agathos
Reviews.Content: hotel located little way town made value money stayed three nights small twin room 4th floor really clean included wifi access bbc theres gym staff incredibly helpful easy get bus town takes 1520 minutes stop walk away near shops dont believe taxi drivers tell long way town experience airport getting train termini taxi ride around late friday night hotel really great would recommend

Reviews.Title: “Helpful Staff, Lovely Rooms, Fairly Bad Location.”
Reviews.Author: lostreehombre
Reviews.Content: may lucky enough upgraded deluxe room aside thought hotel panama great place stay especially service received people reception spoke english us arrival gave us useful advice trams buses get everything etc proved stay room comfortable service excellent

Reviews.Title: “Paper thin walls - take earplugs”

Reviews.Content: hotel great rates good location quiet yet close enough city centre although walking distance rooms modern clean service receptionist couldnt us put us lovely room even offered help ironing wedding following day paying budget rates yet getting 5 star treatment theres also beautiful park right across street fantastic seafood restaurant nearby find fault would breakfast bar could better selection breads fruit juices short recommend

Reviews.Title: “Not a four star as claimed”

Reviews.Title: “Dont hesitate”
